Description: Make sure to check out my other 100 guitars!!! shipping to the lower 48 states only.I will not ship anywhere else.Make sure to check out my other 100 guitars at my ebay store "Axes Bold As Love Guitars". Here is a very cool Epiphone by Gibson SG G310 in Gloss Cardinal Red finish with some nice upgrades. The guitar is in great condition with only mild surface scratches. I did a quick set up to get some nice low action going on. The pickups are some hot HMV Black/White Zebras, they meter 8k-neck,15k-bridge. I also upgraded the capacitors with some nice Japanese Nichicon polyester film and foil caps. So the good news is the guitar plays and sounds great. Guitar plays and sounds way better than stock. I started playing Iron Man as soon as I plugged it in . These pickups sound great in this guitar. Guitar looks,plays,and sounds great. Please study the pictures to get a better idea. I only ship fully insured to the lower 48 states,and nowhere else. I describe all guitars to the best of my abilities.I don't take every guitar apart to check every freaking screw.I disclose all pimples just so there are no misunderstandings.All guitars are sold as is. Insurance is included in my shipping and handling charges.I will not ship out of the U.S. My feedback is public record,and I aim to keep it good. I will no longer do local pickups period. Make sure to look at all pictures carefully,ask all question before you bid! All sales are final,and there will be no refunds, or returns unless you can prove an item was grossly misrepresented. Consider this a contract if you bid. Sorry it has to be like that,blame the clever scam artist that spend all their time trying to beat somebody,instead of working.
